text: The 2004 State of the Union Address was given by the 43rd president of the United States, George W. Bush. It happened on January 20, 2004 at 9:00 p.m. EST. It was given in the chamber of the United States House of Representatives. Category:George W. Bush Category:State of the Union Address Category:2004 in the United States
title: 2004 State of the Union Address
